Keyword_Questions.name: Questions
Keyword_Questions.Q0: What is the ID of the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Q1: What is a keyword or term used in MAIDS that you believe would be helpful to describe the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Q2: What is the definition of the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Q3: What is the link to online material further discussing of the keyword?

Keyword_1.name: Keyword 1
Keyword_1.A2: IndoCyanine Green. Flourescent Dye approved for human usage

Keyword_2.name: Keyword 2
Keyword_2.A2: ICG-Flourescence Angiography. i.e. vizualization of blood vessels using ICG flourescence

Keyword_3.name: Keyword 3
Keyword_3.A2: Quantitative ICG. The name of the algorithm create by project group. Refers

Keyword_4.name: Keyword 4
Keyword_4.A2: Flourescence Enhanced Reality. Similar algorithm to QICG, different group of researchers

Keyword_8.name: Keyword 8
Keyword_8.A2: the union of parts or branches so as to intercommunicate or interconnect

Keyword_9.name: Keyword 9
Keyword_9.A2: Any assessment of blood flow to organ or region. Adjectives determines context. E.g. quantitative or visual
